main.cpp

#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>

#include "TH1F.h"
#include "TRandom3.h"
#include "TString.h"
#include "TGraph.h"

#include "bayesHistComp.h"

using namespace std;

int main (int argc, char * const argv[]) 
{

    // Fire up the random number generator
    TRandom3 random(0);
        
    //                 Define models                //
    
    int nBins = 50;
    int nSamples = 50000;
    
    // Model One
    double aOne = 100;
    double bOne = 5;
    double cOne = (double)nBins;
    double normOne = aOne * cOne + 0.5 * bOne * cOne * cOne;
    
    aOne /= normOne;
    bOne /= normOne;

    // Model Two
    //double aTwo = 350;
    //double bTwo = -5;
    double aTwo = 200;
    double bTwo = 5;
    double cTwo = (double)nBins;
    double normTwo = aTwo * cTwo + 0.5 * bTwo * cTwo * cTwo;
    
    aTwo /= normTwo;
    bTwo /= normTwo;
    
    // Envelope distribution for importance sampling
    double a = 120;
    double b = 0;
    double c = (double)nBins;
    double norm = a * c + 0.5 * b * c * c;
    
    a /= norm;
    b /= norm;
  
    //               Create histograms              //
    
    TH1F dataOne("dataOne", "Data One", nBins, 0, nBins);
    dataOne.SetLineColor(2);
    for(int n = 0; n < nSamples; ++n)
    {
        double x = (sqrt(aOne * aOne + 2.0 * bOne * random.Rndm()) - aOne) / bOne;
        dataOne.Fill(x);
    }
    
    TH1F dataTwo("dataTwo", "Data Two", nBins, 0, nBins);
    dataTwo.SetLineColor(4);
    for(int n = 0; n < nSamples; ++n)
    {
        double x = (sqrt(aTwo * aTwo + 2.0 * bTwo * random.Rndm()) - aTwo) / bTwo;
        dataTwo.Fill(x);
    }
    
    TH1F simuOneW("simuOneW", "Simu One", nBins, 0, nBins);
    simuOneW.Sumw2();
    simuOneW.GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(0, 2200);
    simuOneW.SetLineColor(3);
    
    TH1F simuOneNoW("simuOneNoW", "Simu One", nBins, 0, nBins);
    
    for(int i = 0; i < nSamples; ++i)
    {
        double x = c * random.Rndm();
        double weight = (aOne + bOne * x) / (a + b * x);
        simuOneW.Fill(x, weight);
        simuOneNoW.Fill(x);
    }  
    
    TH1F simuTwoW("simuTwoW", "Simu Two", nBins, 0, nBins);
    simuTwoW.Sumw2();
    simuTwoW.SetLineColor(5);

    TH1F simuTwoNoW("simuTwoNoW", "Simu Two", nBins, 0, nBins);
    
    for(int i = 0; i < 1.5 * nSamples; ++i)
    {
        double x = c * random.Rndm();
        double weight = (aTwo + bTwo * x) / (a + b * x);
        simuTwoW.Fill(x, weight);
        simuTwoNoW.Fill(x);
    }  
    
    //               Compare Histograms             //
    
    TString dataDataName = "/Users/Zeplin/Desktop/dataData.eps";
    TString dataSimuName = "/Users/Zeplin/Desktop/dataSimu.eps";
    TString simuSimuName = "/Users/Zeplin/Desktop/simuSimu.eps";
    
    bayesHistComp comp(200);
    comp.setVerbosity(true);
    
    // Compare two histograms from data, drawing results in the image "dataDataName"
    comp.compareDataData(&dataOne, &dataTwo, dataDataName);
    cout << endl;
    
    // Compare a histogram from data to one from simulation, storing the mixture posterior in "dataSimuName"
    TGraph graph(0);
    comp.compareDataSimu(&dataOne, &simuOneW, &simuOneNoW, dataSimuName);
    cout << endl;
    
    // Compare two histograms from simulation with not additional output
    comp.compareSimuSimu(&simuOneW, &simuOneNoW, &simuTwoW, &simuTwoNoW, simuSimuName);
    cout << endl;
    
    return 0;
    
}
Generated on Fri Sep 10 11:12:24 2010 by  1.5.7
